title: FPS Battle Royale Template
description: With this template, create your own Battle Royale game.
longDescription:
UE Version 4.19+


Due to lack of support and updates from Gamesparks for their plugin on the marketplace, I have rewritten the project to use networking provided by Unreal Engine. Versions 4.19 and up will no longer have user login, lobby, or matchmaking and it will be just the gameplay from the previous versions. Updated demonstration and tutorial videos will be created. The new versions can also be played in editor unlike the previous versions. The new versions will only run on dedicated servers. Video tutorials on how to set up dedicated servers will be created as well.


UE Version 4.16-4.18


Demonstration Video

Tutorial Video


FPS Battle Royale Template is a 100% Blueprint project that turns your Battle Royale type game into a reality.


FPS Battle Royale Template has the basic setup for a last man standing type game. After finding a match through the GameSparks matchmaking process, the player is entered into a game where they start with nothing and are forced to find weapons to defeat all of their opponents until they are the only one left alive.


The technical demonstration level connects to an already set up GameSparks backend. Please refer to the documentation videos on how to connect the template to your own GameSparks account.
technicalDetails:
UE Engine v4.16-4.18 GameSparks plugin dependent - must have installed from the marketplace in your engine. (not required for v4.19+)


Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 100% Blueprints
  • Stand-Alone Template
  • Full Multiplayer (no single player)
  • Gamesparks Connect (v4.16-4.18 only)
  • Username With Password Login / Registration System (v4.16-4.18 only)
  • Matchmaking (v4.16-4.18 only)
  • First Person Gameplay
  • Third Person Mesh for Other Players
  • Weapons with Separate Ammo Types
  • Starter Animations
  • Pickup Items
  • Spawning Pickup Items Randomly
  • Inventory System - Simple 2 Weapon, Ammo, and Banadages
  • No Inventory Screen to Promote Fast Gameplay
  • Line Trace for Shooting
  • Healing System
  • Damage System
  • Kill Notifications
  • Kill Counter
  • Level Streaming - Login, Loading, Lobby, Arena (v4.16-4.18 only)

Number of Blueprints: 19

Number of Widgets: 12

Input: Keyboard & Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes. GameSparks for v4.16-4.18, Unreal Engine networking for 4.19+

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: Written Documentation

Important/Additional Notes: Support Thread
